Source: München 1856: Vier Karten, die Ihren Blick auf die Stadt verändern
Reference: Munich 1856: Four maps that will change your view of the city
Translation: Munich 1856: Four cards that change your view of the city.

Source: Eine Irren-Anstalt, wo sich heute Jugendliche begegnen sollen.
Reference: A mental asylum, where today young people are said to meet.
Translation: A mental asylum where teenagers are supposed to meet today.

Source: Eine Gruftkapelle, wo nun für den S-Bahn-Tunnel gegraben wird.
Reference: A crypt chapel, where they are now digging tunnels for the S-Bahn.
Translation: A crypt chapel, where the S-Bahn tunnel is now being dug.

Source: Kleingärtner bewirtschaften den einstigen Grund von Bauern.
Reference: Allotment holders cultivate the soil of former farmers.
Translation: Small-scale farmers cultivate the former farmland of farmers.

Source: Die älteste offizielle Karte Münchens fördert spannende Geschichten zu Tage.
Reference: The oldest official map of Munich brings captivating stories to light.
Translation: The oldest official Munich card reveals fascinating stories to this day.

Source: Es nervt, wenn Landkarten nicht aktuell sind.
Reference: It is annoying when geographical maps are not up-to-date.
Translation: It's nerve-wracking when maps aren't up-to-date.

Source: Das kennt jeder, der sich schon mal aufregen musste, weil das Auto-Navi statt einer Umgehungsstraße eine grüne Wiese anzeigte.
Reference: Anyone who has ever got worked up because the car's sat-nav is showing a green field instead of a bypass knows that.
Translation: Anyone who has ever had to deal with the frustration of their car's navigation system suggesting a grassy field instead of a bypass is familiar with this.

Source: Die historischen Landkarten des digitalen Bayern-Atlases, ein Angebot des Geoportals Bayern der Staatsregierung, sind alles andere als aktuell - doch gerade deshalb sehr aufschlussreich.
Reference: The historical maps of the digital BayernAtlas, an offering from the State Government's Geoportal Bayern, are anything but up-to-date – and yet it is precisely for this reason that they are so informative.
Translation: The historical maps of the Digital Bavaria Atlas, an offering of the Bavarian State Government's Geoportal, are far from current - yet precisely for that reason, highly insightful.

Source: Besonders wenn man sie mit aktuellen Online-Karten vergleicht.
Reference: Especially when one compares them with current online maps.
Translation: Especially when compared to current online cards.

Source: Dann wird deutlich, wie sich Städte und Gemeinden im Verbreitungsgebiet des Münchner Merkur seit dem 19. Jahrhundert verändert haben.
Reference: Then it becomes clear how the towns and municipalities in the distribution area of Munich's Merkur newspaper have changed since the 19th century.
Translation: Then it becomes clear how cities and municipalities in the distribution area of the Munich Mercury have changed since the 19th century.

Source: Der digitale Bayern-Atlas ist ein Flickenteppich, den man als solchen nicht gleich erkennt.
Reference: The digital BayernAtlas is a patchwork quilt that one doesn't quite recognise for what it is at first.
Translation: The digital Bavarian Atlas is like a patchwork quilt that one cannot immediately recognize as such.

Source: In die große Übersichtskarte wurden für Städte und Gemeinden detailliertere Karten, sogenannte Urpositionsblätter, eingearbeitet.
Reference: Within the large overview map, were worked in detailed maps for towns and municipalities, so-called original-lay-of-the-land sheets.
Translation: Detailed maps, known as Urpositionsblätter, were incorporated into the comprehensive overview map for cities and municipalities.

Source: Diese entstanden nach Angaben der Bayerischen Vermessungsverwaltung zwischen 1810 und 1864 und entspringen der ersten Vermessung Bayerns.
Reference: According to information from the Bavarian Surveying and Mapping Authority, these came into being between 1810 and 1864 and arise out of the first survey of Bavaria.
Translation: These maps emerged based on the Bavarian Surveying Administration's guidelines between 1810 and 1864 and are derived from the first survey of Bavaria.

Source: Ihr Auftraggeber: Napoleon.
Reference: Their commissioner: Napoleon.
Translation: Your client: Napoleon.

Source: Der französische Heeresführer besetzte Bayern seit dem Frühjahr 1800 während des Zweiten Koalitionskrieges mit Österreich.
Reference: The French army commander had occupied Bavaria since the spring in 1800, during the War of the Second Coalition with Austria.
Translation: The French military leader occupied Bavaria since the spring of 1800 during the Second Coalition War with Austria.

Source: Napoleon wünschte sich einen Überblick über das besetzte Land und gab eine topographische Aufnahme Bayerns in Auftrag - natürlich zu militärischen Zwecken.
Reference: Napoleon wanted to gain an overview of the occupied land and commissioned a topographical survey – naturally for military purposes.
Translation: Napoleon desired a survey of the occupied land and commissioned a topographic survey of Bavaria - naturally for military purposes.

Source: Auch wenn die französischen Truppen mit dem Frieden von Lunéville vom 9. Februar 1801 schließlich abzogen: Es waren die heutigen Nachbarn, die die Idee einer flächendeckenden Bayern-Karte kreierten.
Reference: Even if the French troops finally retreated with the Treaty of Lunéville from 9th February 1801: it was the current neighbours who had the idea to create a comprehensive map of Bavaria.
Translation: Even though the French troops finally withdrew from Lunéville on February 9, 1801, it was the local population that came up with the idea of a Bavarian map covering the entire region.

Source: Kurfürst Max IV. Joseph trieb das Projekt weiter voran, gründete das "Topographische Bureau" - und damit die Bayerische Vermessungsverwaltung.
Reference: Elector Max IV. Joseph propelled the project further forward, founding the "Topographical Bureau" – and with that, the Bavarian Surveying and Mapping Authority.
Translation: Kurfürst Max IV. Joseph continued to drive the project forward, founded the "Topographic Bureau" - and thus the Bavarian Surveying Administration.

Source: Das Urpositionsblatt für München stammt aus dem Jahr 1856 und ist wie sämtliche andere auf der Internetseite der Bayerischen Landesbibliothek zu finden.
Reference: The original lay-of-the-land sheet for Munich originates from 1856 and, like all the others, can be found on the website of the Bavarian State Library.
Translation: The origin document for Munich dates back to 1856 and can be found on the Bavarian State Library's website.

Source: Der Vergleich Früher/Heute ist am Beispiel der Landeshauptstadt am eindrücklichsten.
Reference: The comparison of past/present is most impressive taking the example of the state capital.
Translation: The comparison between then and now is most striking in the capital city.

Source: Die Stadt hat sich in alle Richtungen ausgedehnt und ist zusammengewachsen.
Reference: The city has stretched out in all directions and coalesced.
Translation: The city has expanded in all directions and has conurbated.

Source: Ein Beispiel dafür ist Untersendling, das in der Karte von 1856 noch relativ isoliert auftaucht.
Reference: An example of this is Untersendling, which still appears relatively isolated on the map from 1856.
Translation: An example of this is Untersendling, which appears relatively isolated in the map of 1856.

Source: Sendling wurde 21 Jahre nach Erstellung der Karte, also 1877, als Münchner Stadtteil eingemeindet.
Reference: Sendling was incorporated as an urban district of Munich 21 years after the map was created.
Translation: The suburb of Sendling was annexed to Munich 21 years after the card was created, in 1877.

Source: Heute liegt Untersendling mitten in der Stadt.
Reference: Today, Untersendling lies in the middle of the city.
Translation: Today, the Untersendling is right in the middle of the city.

Source: Die Häuser Untersendlings konzentrieren sich um 1856 entlang der heutigen Plinganserstraße, die erst 1878 nach Georg Sebastian Plinganser benannt wurde, einem Anführer des Aufstands der bayerischen Bauern gegen Österreich 1705.
Reference: Around 1856, Untersendling's houses are concentrated along what is today Plinganserstraße, which was first named in 1878 after Georg Sebastian Plinganser, a ringleader of the Bavarian farmers' revolt against Austria in 1705.
Translation: The houses in Untersendlings revolve around 1856 along the present-day Plinganserstraße, which was only named after Georg Sebastian Plinganser in 1878, a leader of the Bavarian peasants' uprising against Austria in 1705.

Source: Wo heute der Westpark ist, sieht man nichts als Felder - auf den ersten Blick: Beim Hineinzoomen erscheint eine kleinteiligere Karte mit dutzenden Linien und Zahlen: handschriftlich nummerierte Flurstücke aus der sogenannten "Uraufnahme", aus der die Grundsteuer abgeleitet wurde.
Reference: Where the West Park is today, one sees nothing but field – at first sight: upon zooming in, a more detailed small-scale map with dozens of lines and numbers appears: hand-numbered plots from the so-called "original record", from which the property tax was derived.
Translation: Where the Westpark is today, one sees nothing but fields at first glance. As one approaches, a small-scale map with countless lines and numbers appears: handwrittenly numbered plots from the so-called "Uraufnahme", from which the land tax is derived.

Source: Kleine Parzellen belegen dort heute keine Landwirte mehr - sondern Kleingärtner der Anlage "Land in Sonne".
Reference: Today, it is no longer farmers who occupy small parcels there – rather, it is allotment holders of the "Land in Sonne" facility.
Translation: Small plots are no longer cultivated there today - but hobby gardeners from the "Land in Sonne" facility.

Source: Eine große Grünfläche zeichnet sich nördlich von Untersendling ab.
Reference: A large green area is apparent to the north of Untersendling.
Translation: A large green area extends north of Untersendling.

Source: Die Theresienwiese, seit 1810 Schauplatz des Oktoberfests, war im 19. Jahrhundert tatsächlich noch eine Wiese - und keine Betonwüste.
Reference: Theresienwiese, since 1810 the scene of Oktoberfest, was in the 19th century still actually a "Wiese" – a meadow – and not a concrete wasteland.
Translation: The Theresienwiese, which has been the site of the Oktoberfest since 1810, was actually still a meadow - not a concrete desert - in the 19th century.

Source: Auf der anderen Seite der Isar gibt die historische Karte einen Einblick in die Geschichte der psychiatrischen Medizin.
Reference: On the other side of the Isar, the historical map gives an insight into the history of psychiatric medicine.
Translation: Across the Isar River, the historical map offers a glimpse into the history of psychiatry.

Source: Im Urpositionsblatt liest man im Gebiet des heutigen Bezirks Au-Haidhausen nicht nur den Straßennamen "am Gasteig" oder von der Anhöhe "Auf der Lüften" - sondern auch in großen Buchstaben "Irren Anstalt".
Reference: In the original lay-of-the-land sheet, in the area where today the borough of Au-Haidhausen is, one can make out not only the street name "am Gasteig" or the elevation "Auf der Lüften" – but can actually read in large letters "mental asylum".
Translation: In the founding document, one not only reads in the area of the present-day Au-Haidhausen district street names such as "am Gasteig" or the elevation "Auf der Lüften" - but also in capital letters "Irren Anstalt".

Source: Ja, hier an der Auerfeldstraße sperrte man einst Menschen mit Wahnvorstellungen ein.
Reference: Yes, here on Auerfeldstraße, they once imprisoned people with delusions.
Translation: Yes, at Auerfeldstraße, people with delusions once used to be locked up.

Source: Dort war 1858/59 die Münchner Kreis-Irrenanstalt "Auf der Auer Lüften" entstanden.
Reference: The Munich district mental asylum "Auf der Auer Lüften" had come to life there in 1858/59.
Translation: There, in 1858/59, the Munich Circle-Insane Asylum "Auf der Auer Lüften" came into being.

Source: Ab 1872 leitete Dr. Bernhard von Gudden die Einrichtung - jener Psychiater, der in Zusammenhang mit dem Tod von König Ludwigs II. gebracht wird.
Reference: From 1872, Dr. Bernhard von Gudden led the institution – the psychiatrist who is associated with the death of King Ludwig II.
Translation: From 1872, Dr. Bernhard von Gudden headed the establishment - the psychiatrist who is associated with the death of King Ludwig II.

Source: "Er war fortschrittlich für seine Zeit und beendete zum Beispiel das Anketten der sogenannten Irren.
Reference: "He was progressive for his time and ended, for example, the practice of chaining up the so-called mad men.
Translation: He was progressive for his time and ended practices like chaining the so-called mad people.

Source: Für 280 Patienten war zunächst Platz gewesen, später wurde auf 500 Plätze erweitert.
Reference: Originally there was place for 280 patients; later this was expanded to 500 places.
Translation: For 280 patients, space had originally been available, but later it was expanded to 500 places.

Source: Irgendwann reichte auch diese Kapazität nicht mehr aus - der Grund für den Bau der Kreisirrenanstalt in Haar 1905.
Reference: At some point even this capacity was no longer enough – the reason why the district mental asylum in Haar was constructed in 1905.
Translation: Eventually, this capacity was no longer enough - the reason for the construction of the Kreisirrenanstalt in Haar in 1905.

Source: Dort befindet sich seit 2006 das Isar-Amper-Klinikum München-Ost, eine der größten Psychiatrien Deutschlands.
Reference: The Isar Amper Clinic, East Munich, has been located there since 2006, one of the largest psychiatric units in Germany.
Translation: Since 2006, the Isar-Amper-Klinikum München-Ost has been located there, one of the largest psychiatric hospitals in Germany.

Source: Auf dem Areal der ehemaligen Auer Anstalt begegnen sich nun Jugendliche im Münchner Salesianum.
Reference: On the plot of the former Auer institution, young people now meet in the Munich Salesianum.
Translation: On the grounds of the former Auer Anstalt, young people are now meeting in the Munich Salesianum.

Source: Der Orden erwarb den Gebäudekomplex 1920 und wandelte ihn in ein Jugendheim mit Ausbildungsbetrieben um.
Reference: The order acquired the building complex in 1920 and converted it into a youth centre with training programmes.
Translation: The order acquired the building complex in 1920 and converted it into a youth home with vocational training facilities.

Source: Westlich liegt der Fußballplatz des TSV München Ost, östlich Wohnhäuser aus den 1980er Jahren.
Reference: To the west lies the football pitch of TSV München Ost, and to the east, residential houses from the 1980s.
Translation: West of the TSV München Ost football pitch lies to the west, while residential houses from the 1980s stand to the east.

Source: 2015 errichtete man das Kinder-Haus "Casa Don Bosco" - in architektonischer Anlehnung an den Ursprungsbau der Irrenanstalt, der im Zweiten Weltkrieg bei Bombenangriffen zerstört worden war.
Reference: In 2015, the "Casa Don Bosco" nursery was built – in the architectural style of the original mental asylum building, which had been destroyed in the Second World War in bomb attacks.
Translation: In 2015, the "Casa Don Bosco" children's home was built - architecturally inspired by the original building of the asylum, which was destroyed during aerial raids in World War II.

Source: Der Marienplatz war um 1856 als "Haupt Platz" verzeichnet, die Kaufingerstraße hieß "Kaufinger Gasse".
Reference: Marienplatz was recorded as the "main square" in around 1856, and Kaufingerstraße was called "Kaufinger Gasse".
Translation: The Marienplatz was listed as the "Haupt Platz" in 1856, and the Kaufingerstraße was called "Kaufinger Gasse".

Source: Eine entscheidende Veränderung brachte der Zweite Weltkrieg auch im Herzen Münchens.
Reference: The Second World War also brought a decisive change to the heart of Munich.
Translation: The Second World War also brought about significant changes in the heart of Munich.

Source: Die Bomben der Alliierten rissen im Dezember 1944 viele Löcher in die Innenstadt.
Reference: The bombs of the Allies tore many holes in the city centre in December 1944.
Translation: The Allied bombs caused many holes in the city center in December 1944.

Source: Ein großes blieb bis heute - am Marienhof.
Reference: One big one remains up to this day – at the Marienhof.
Translation: The large one remains until today - at Marienhof.

Source: Das Englische Institut, kleine Geschäftshäuser und eine Gruftkapelle aus dem Mittelalter standen einst am Marienhof, wo dieser Tage die Vorarbeiten und am 5. April 2017 der Spatenstich für die zweite S-Bahn-Stammstrecke erfolgen.
Reference: The English Institute, small commercial premises and a crypt chapel from the Middle Ages once stood in the Marienhof, where these days, preparations for the second S-Bahn main line are underway, with first digging to follow on 5th April 2017.
Translation: The English Institute, small businesses, and a chapel from the Middle Ages once stood at Marienhof, where work on the second S-Bahn main line is scheduled to begin on April 5, 2017.

Source: Mit dem Schieberegler lässt sich die alte München-Karte mit dem Luftbild von heute vergleichen - und das Loch am Marienhof auffüllen.
Reference: You can use the slider control to compare the old Munich map with the aerial view from today – and to fill in the hole at the Marienhof.
Translation: Using the slider, you can compare the old Munich map with today's aerial image - and fill in the gap at Marienhof.

Source: Bürgerrechtsgruppe veröffentlicht Reisewarnung für Missouri
Reference: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri
Translation: Citizen rights group issues travel warning for Missouri

Source: Die Nationale Vereinigung zur Förderung von Farbigen hat eine Warnung für farbige Menschen ausgestellt, die aufgrund der diskriminierenden Politik und der rassistischen Angriffe des Staates nach Missouri reisen.
Reference: The National Association for the Advancement of Colored People has put out an alert for people of color traveling to Missouri because of the state's discriminatory policies and racist attacks.
Translation: The National Association for the Promotion of People of Color has issued a warning to people of color regarding travel to Missouri due to the discriminatory policies and racial attacks in the state.

Source: "Die NAACP Travel Advisory für den Bundesstaat Missouri, die bis zum 28. August 2017 in Kraft treten soll, fordert afro-amerikanische Reisende, Besucher und Missourianer auf, bei Reisen durch den Staat besondere Aufmerksamkeit aufzubringen und äußerste Vorsicht walten zu lassen, da eine Reihe von fragwürdigen, rassenbasierten Vorfällen in letzter Zeit im gesamten Staat vorkommen und hier vermerkt werden", heißt es in der Stellungnahme der Gruppe.
Reference: "The NAACP Travel Advisory for the state of Missouri, effective through August 28th, 2017, calls for African American travelers, visitors and Missourians to pay special attention and exercise extreme caution when traveling throughout the state given the series of questionable, race-based incidents occurring statewide recently, and noted therein," the group's statement reads.
Translation: The NAACP Travel Advisory for the state of Missouri, which comes into force until August 28, 2017, urges African American travelers, visitors, and Missourians to exercise heightened awareness and caution during travel throughout the state. This is due to a series of questionable, racially-charged incidents that have occurred in the state in recent times.

Source: Ein kürzlich verabschiedetes Gesetz von Missouri, das es Menschen schwerer macht, Diskriminierungsklagen zu gewinnen, sowie die Strafverfolgungsbehörden des Staates, die unverhältnismäßig auf Minderheiten abzielen, veranlassten die Gruppe, die Reisewarnung herauszugeben, sagte die NAACP.
Reference: A recent Missouri law making it harder for people to win discrimination lawsuits, as well as the state's law enforcement disproportionately targeting minorities prompted the group to issue the travel alert, the NAACP said.
Translation: A recently passed law in Missouri has made it more difficult for people to win discrimination lawsuits, and has also prompted the state's law enforcement agencies to disproportionately target minorities, the NAACP said.

Source: "Sie haben Verletzungen der Bürgerrechte, die Menschen passieren.
Reference: "You have violations of civil rights that are happening to people.
Translation: "You have violated the fundamental rights of people."

Source: Sie werden wegen ihrer Hautfarbe angehalten, sie werden zusammengeschlagen oder getötet", sagte der Präsident des Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, dem Kansas City Star.
Reference: They're being pulled over because of their skin color, they're being beaten up or killed," the president of the Missouri NAACP, Rod Chapel, told The Kansas City Star.
Translation: "They are detained because of their skin color, beaten or killed," said Rod Chapel, president of the Missouri NAACP, to the Kansas City Star.

Source: "Wir hören Beschwerden in einer solchen Häufigkeit, die wir noch nicht gehört haben."
Reference: "We are hearing complaints at a rate we haven't heard before."
Translation: "We receive complaints at such a frequency that we have never experienced before."

Source: Es ist die erste solche Warnung, die die Organisation für einen Staat in den USA ausgestellt hat.
Reference: It is the first such warning that the organization has issued for a state in the US.
Translation: It is the first such warning to be issued by the organization for a state in the USA.

Source: Die Gruppe zitierte Vorfälle wie rassistische Vergehen gegen schwarze Studenten an der University of Missouri und den Tod von Tory Sanders, 28, einem schwarzen Mann aus Tennessee.
Reference: The group cited incidents such as racial slurs against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, 28, a black man from Tennessee.
Translation: The group cited incidents of racial discrimination against black students at the University of Missouri and the death of Tory Sanders, a 28-year-old black man from Tennessee.

Source: Sanders starb unter fragwürdigen Umständen Anfang des Jahres, nachdem er während der Reise durch den Staat kein Benzin mehr hatte und von der Polizei von Missouri in Gewahrsam genommen wurde, ohne eines Verbrechens beschuldigt zu werden.
Reference: Sanders died under questionable circumstances earlier this year after he ran out of gas while traveling through the state, and was taken into custody by Missouri police without being accused of a crime.
Translation: Sanders died under suspicious circumstances at the beginning of the year, after running out of fuel during a trip through the state and being detained by the Missouri police, without being accused of any crime.

Source: Der Rat weist auch auf einen kürzlich erschienenen Bericht des Büros des Generalstaatsanwaltes von Missouri hin, in dem gezeigt wird, dass schwarze Autofahrer im Staat 75 Prozent häufiger als Weiße angehalten werden.
Reference: The advisory also points to a recent report by the Missouri Attorney General's Office showing that black drivers in the state were 75 percent more likely to be pulled over than whites.
Translation: The council also draws attention to a recently published report by the Missouri Attorney General's Office, which shows that black motorists in the state are stopped 75 percent more often than white motorists.

Source: "Die Empfehlung ist, dass sich die Menschen bewusst sind und ihre Familien, Freunde und Mitarbeiter darüber informieren, was in Missouri passieren könnte", sagte Chapel.
Reference: "The advisory is for people to be aware, and warn their families and friends and co-workers of what could happen in Missouri," Chapel said.
Translation: "It is recommended that people be aware and inform their families, friends, and colleagues about what could happen in Missouri," Chapel said.

Source: "Die Leute müssen bereit sein, ob es Kautionsgeld mitbringen oder die Verwandten wissen lassen, dass sie durch den Staat reisen."
Reference: "People need to be ready, whether it's bringing bail money with them, or letting relatives know they are traveling through the state."
Translation: People must be prepared to either bring a deposit or inform their relatives that they are traveling on state expense.

Source: Missouri verzeichnete im Jahr 2015 100 Hassverbrechen, nach den neuesten Zahlen aus dem Hassverbrechens-Berichtsprogramm des FBI, die den Staat in Bezug auf die Anzahl solcher Verletzungen auf den 16. Rang des Landes einstufen.
Reference: Missouri recorded 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI's hate crime reporting program, ranking the state at 16th in the country in terms of the number of such violations.
Translation: Missouri recorded 100 hate crimes in 2015, according to the latest figures from the FBI's Hate Crimes Reporting Program, which ranked the state 16th in the nation for such offenses.

Source: Die Reisewarnung ist auch eine Antwort auf ein neues Missouri-Gesetz, das es schwieriger machen würde, ein Unternehmen wegen Wohnungs- oder Beschäftigungs-Diskriminierung zu verklagen.
Reference: The travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that would make it more difficult to sue a business for housing or employment discrimination.
Translation: The travel warning is also a response to a new Missouri law that makes it more difficult to sue a company for housing or employment discrimination.

Source: Zuvor hatte die American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) Reisewarnungen für Texas und Arizona herausgegeben, nachdem die Staaten Einwanderungsgesetze verabschiedet hatten, die lokale Strafverfolgungsbehörden dazu verpflichten, Menschen wegen Zuwanderungsverstößen zu verhaften, was nach Ansicht der ACLU zur weiteren Rassenprofilierung beitragen wird.
Reference: Previously, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) had issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration enforcement laws requiring local law enforcement to detain people on immigration violations which the ACLU said would increase racial profiling.
Translation: Prior to this, the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) issued travel advisories for Texas and Arizona after the states passed immigration laws that obligated local law enforcement agencies to detain individuals for immigration violations, which, according to the ACLU, contributes to racial profiling.

Source: Reisewarnungen werden in der Regel vom Außenministerium für andere Länder ausgestellt, aber in letzter Zeit haben Interessengruppen die Maßnahme als Reaktion auf bestimmte Gesetze und Trends innerhalb der USA eingesetzt.
Reference: Travel warnings are usually issued by the State Department for other countries, but lately, advocacy groups have resorted to the measure in response to certain laws and trends inside the US.
Translation: Travel advisories are usually issued by the Foreign Office for other countries. However, in recent times, interest groups have employed the measure in response to certain laws and trends within the United States.

Source: Weidezaunprojekt ist elementar
Reference: Pasture fence project is fundamental
Translation:
The English translation of the German text "Weidezaunprojekt ist elementar" is:

**The fence project is fundamental.**

Source: Das Fischerbacher Weidezaun-Projekt ist ein Erfolgsprojekt und wird im kommenden Jahr fortgesetzt.
Reference: The Fischerbach pasture fence project is a successful project and will be continued next year.
Translation: The Fischerbacher Weidezaun-Project is a successful project and will continue next year.

Source: Die CDU-Bundestagsabgeordneten Peter Weiß und Kordula Kovac haben sich vor Ort ein Bild verschafft.
Reference: Members of the Bundestag for the CDU Peter Weiß and Kordula Kovac got a first-hand view.
Translation: Conservative parliamentary group members Peter Weiß and Kordula Kovac have taken a picture together at the event.

Source: Beim Rechtgrabenhof der Familie Schwendemann trafen sich Vertreter des Fischerbacher CDU-Ortsverbands zusammen mit Bürgermeister Thomas Schneider und den beiden Abgeordneten.
Reference: Representatives from the Fischerbach local CDU group met with mayor Thomas Schneider and the two representatives at Rechtgrabenhof farm, belonging to the Schwendemann family.
Translation: At the Schwendemann family's gravel pit, representatives of the Fischerbach CDU local association met with Mayor Thomas Schneider and the two councillors.

Source: Markus Schwendemann gewährte zunächst Einblicke in seinen Betrieb, in dem er 55 Hektar Wiesen und 40 Hektar Wald bewirtschaftet, 40 Milchkühe und ebenso viele Jungtiere versorgt und in fünf Wohnungen Feriengäste beherbergt.
Reference: To start with, Markus Schwendemann gave insights into his business, in which he cultivates 55 hectares of pasture and 40 hectares of woodland, keeps 40 milk cows and just as many young stock, and accommodates five apartments of holiday makers.
Translation: Markus Schwendemann initially offered a glimpse into his business, which encompasses 55 hectares of meadows and 40 hectares of forest, as well as providing for 40 cows and an equal number of calves, and accommodating five holiday guests in five accommodations.

Source: Die "Schwarzwaldmilch" ist für ihn der alternativlose Vermarktungsweg für die Milch seiner Kühe, so Schwendemann.
Reference: Schwendemann says that, for him, there is no alternative to the "Black Forest milk" marketing channel he uses for the milk from his cows.
Translation: "Black Forest milk" is his only marketing channel for the milk from his cows, Schwendemann says.

Source: Auf den Tisch der Feriengäste kommt ausschließlich Regionales.
Reference: Only regional produce is served to the holiday-makers.
Translation: Only regional dishes are served on the table of holiday guests.

Source: Da er auch BLHV-Vorsitzender von Fischerbach ist, bezeichnete er das Weidezaunprojekt als "elementar wichtig".
Reference: Since he is also BLHV chairman for Fischerbach, he described the pasture fence project as "fundamentally important".
Translation: Since he is also the chairman of the BLHV association in Fischerbach, he described the weirde fence project as "elementally important".

Source: Ich kann auf derart steilen Flächen nicht gewinnbringend wirtschaften.
Reference: I can't make a profit on that kind of steep-sloping ground.
Translation: I cannot economically exploit such vast areas.

Source: Die Grünlandfläche sorge für viel Arbeit, vieles müsse mit der Motorsense bearbeitet werden.
Reference: Grassland areas make for a lot of work, a lot has to be done with the string trimmer.
Translation: The grassland area requires a lot of work, as much of it needs to be handled with a motor mower.

Source: "Wir haben hier mit den Bedingungen und mit der Topografie zu kämpfen", betonte Schwendemann.
Reference: "We have to grapple with the conditions and with the topography here," stressed Schwendemann.
Translation: "We have to deal with the conditions and the topography here," Schwendemann emphasized.

Source: 2003 habe er den elterlichen Betrieb übernommen und bewirtschafte diesen ohne chemischen Pflanzenschutz und Dünger, auch wenn er keinen Biobetrieb führe.
Reference: In 2003, he took over his parents' business and he manages this without chemical crop protection and fertilisers, even if it's not an organic farm that he's running.
Translation: In 2003, he took over the family business and ran it without chemical plant protection or fertilizers, even though he did not operate a bio-farm.

Source: Für Bürgermeister Thomas Schneider war klar: "Die Kommune hat die Bedeutung des Weidezaunprojekts erkannt und ist froh über die Leader-Förderung".
Reference: For Mayor Thomas Schneider, it was clear that "the community has recognised the importance of the pasture fence project and is happy to have the Leader funding".
Translation: For Mayor Thomas Schneider, it was clear: "The commune has recognized the importance of the weirdezaun project and is happy about the leadership promotion."

Source: Bei Kosten von 3000 bis 4000 Euro pro Hektar müssten die Landwirte unterstützt werden.
Reference: The farmers need support to the tune of 3000 to 4000 euros per hectare.
Translation: Farmers should be supported when costs range from 3000 to 4000 euros per hectare.

Source: Man hoffe, dass damit die Aufforstung der Flächen noch eine ganze Weile hinausgezogen werden könnte.
Reference: One hopes that with that, afforestation of the area could then be drawn out for a long while.
Translation: We hope that with this measure, the forest regeneration of the areas can be postponed for some time.

Source: "Der größte Schatz den wir haben, sind die Leute, die in der Landwirtschaft arbeiten und sich Gedanken darum machen, wie sie ihren Betrieb weiter bringen", betonte der Bürgermeister.
Reference: "The biggest asset that we have are the people who work in agriculture and who give thought to how to bring their businesses forward," stressed the mayor.
Translation: "The greatest treasure we have is the people working in agriculture and who are concerned about how to carry on their operations," the mayor emphasized.

Source: Die Landwirte stehen wegen der Förderung oft in der Kritik
Reference: The farmers are often the target of criticism thanks to the funding.
Translation: Farmers often face criticism due to subsidies.

Source: Über die Weidezaunförderung wurden im Jahr 2013 insgesamt 25 Parzellen von elf Teilnehmern eingezäunt.
Reference: Using the pasture fence funding, a total of 25 plots from eleven participants were fenced off in 2013.
Translation: A total of 25 plots were enclosed by 11 participants in 2013 as part of the Weidezaunförderung program.

Source: Die Offenhaltungsfläche beträgt damit 40 Hektar, die bis mindestens 2023 nicht aufgeforstet werden dürfen.
Reference: The areas kept open with these amount to 40 hectares, which may not be afforested until at least 2023.
Translation: The open space area thus amounts to 40 hectares and may not be developed until at least 2023.

Source: Von den Gesamtkosten in Höhe von 71 500 Euro wurde die Hälfte über Leader gefördert, ein viertel trug die Gemeinde Fischerbach.
Reference: Of the total costs, to the tune of 71,500 euros, half was funded via Leader, and a quarter was borne by the community of Fischerbach.
Translation: Of the total costs of €71,500, half was was promoted by the leader, while a quarter was borne by the Fischerbach community.

Source: Somit verblieben den Landwirten 12 610 Euro, die sie in 16,2 Kilometer Weidezaun investieren mussten.
Reference: The farmers were thus left with 12,610 euros, which they had to invest in the 16.2-kilometre pasture fence.
Translation: In total, the farmers were reimbursed 12,610 euros for the 16.2 kilometers of fence they had to invest in.

Source: "Der große Vorteil ist die Langlebigkeit der Zäune", erklärte Schwendemann.
Reference: "The great advantage is the longevity of the fences," explained Schwendemann.
Translation: "The great advantage is the longevity of the cables," Schwendemann explained.

Source: Kordula Kovac betonte: "Ihr macht einen richtig guten Job, ohne Landwirte und Landfrauen geht es nicht".
Reference: Kordula Kovac stressed: "You're doing a really good job. Without farmers we'd not be able to function."
Translation: Cordula Kovac stated: "You're doing a great job, but it won't work without farmers and farm women."

Source: Auch für Peter Weiß stand fest: "Hier werden beste Lebensmittel produziert".
Reference: Peter Weiß is also standing firm: "First-class foodstuffs are produced here."
Translation: "It was also fixed for Peter Weiß: 'Here, the best foods are produced'."

Source: Die Landschaftspflegerichtlinie (LPR) Baden-Württemberg ermöglicht die staatliche Förderung von Weidezäunen.
Reference: The Baden-Württemberg directive on countryside conservation (LPR) makes the government funding of pasture fences possible.
Translation: The Landscape Care Line (LPR) in Baden-Württemberg enables the state-funded promotion of hay meadows.

Source: Ziel ist die Offenhaltung des Schwarzwalds.
Reference: Its goal is to keep the Black Forest open.
Translation: The goal is to preserve the Black Forest.

Source: Voraussetzung ist das Vorhandensein einer von der LPR bezeichneten Förderkulisse.
Reference: A prerequisite is the existence of one of the funding scenarios as outlined by the LPR.
Translation: The prerequisite is the availability of one of the LPR-designated funding schemes.

Source: Außerdem darf die einzuzäunende Fläche nicht schlepperbewirtschaftbar sein (Hangneigung über 35 Prozent) und muss damit von der Aufforstung bedroht sein.
Reference: In addition, the fenced-off area is not allowed to be farmable with a tractor (gradient of over 35 per cent) and must therefore be threatened with afforestation.
Translation: Furthermore, the enclosed area must not be prone to sloppy farming (slope over 35 percent) and must therefore be at risk of deforestation.

Source: Für das Fischerbacher Weidezaunprojekt 2018 läuft derzeit der Antrag von acht Teilnehmern mit 24 Parzellen, die knapp 16 Kilometer Zaun bauen möchten.
Reference: For the 2018 Fischerbach pasture fence project, an application is currently underway from eight participants with 24 plots who would like to build just shy of 16 kilometres of fence.
Translation: For the Fischerbacher Weidezaun project in 2018, eight participants are currently applying to build approximately 16 kilometers of fence on 24 plots.

Source: Die Offenhaltungsfläche entspricht 35 Hektar, die kalkulierten Kosten liegen bei mehr als 112 000 Euro.
Reference: The areas of land to be kept open equate to 35 hectares; the calculated costs amount to more than 112,000 euros.
Translation: The open space area measures 35 hectares, and the calculated costs amount to more than 112,000 euros.

Source: Ist nichts mehr heilig?
Reference: Is nothing sacred?
Translation: The translation of the German text "Ist nichts mehr heilig?" to English is "Is nothing left that is holy/sacred?"

Source: Jetzt nimmt sich das Weiße Haus von Trump die Freiheitsstatue vor
Reference: Now Trump's White House is targeting the Statue of Liberty
Translation:
In English, the translation is:

"Trump's White House is now taking down the Statue of Liberty."

Source: Das sicherste Zeichen eines Regime-Wechsels ist es, wenn sie beginnen, die Statuen zu attackieren.
Reference: The surest mark of regime change is when they start attacking the statues.
Translation: The most certain sign of a regime change is when they begin to attack the statues.

Source: Die Amerikaner schätzen diese ebenso wie jede andere - daher der sorgsam inszenierte Sturz Saddam Husseins auf dem Firdos Platz in Bagdad im Jahr 2003.
Reference: Americans appreciate this as well as anyone - hence the carefully stage-manged toppling of Saddam Hussein in Firdos square in Baghdad in 2003.
Translation: Americans hold this in high regard just like anything else - therefore the meticulously staged fall of Saddam Hussein at Firdos Square in Baghdad in 2003.
